cluster_relations.rel_desc: Dark pasts of haunted houses are linked to the sense of lurking dangers.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that two entities are linked through narrative, emotional, or conceptual association within a thematic or story context, without asserting direct causality.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: StoryRole: threat backstory for haunted houses

remarks: Semantics somewhat indirect; relation mainly captures that dark pasts contribute to perceived danger.
Semantics somewhat indirect; relation mainly captures that dark pasts contribute to perceived danger.
Semantics somewhat indirect; relation mainly captures that dark pasts contribute to perceived danger.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Cursed objects in stories are thematically linked to lurking dangers.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that two entities are linked through narrative, emotional, or conceptual association within a thematic or story context, without asserting direct causality.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: NarrativeFunction: example of a dangerous or ominous object

remarks: Could also be modeled as cursed objects causing danger; text only implies this via the warning context.
Could also be modeled as cursed objects causing danger; text only implies this via the warning context.
